name: Warrior Women - Hidden Object
description:
Warrior Women - Hidden Object is a beautiful, fun, relaxing and free adventure game.

Journey into the fierce world of female warriors as you search for different hidden objects. There are no timers or points to score, just AMAZING scenes of Beautiful Pirates, Battle Hardened Warriors, Elven Archers and even Zombie Hunters. Find all the hidden objects at your own pace!

FEATURES:
- BREATHTAKING and beautiful visuals!
- Lots of hidden objects to find
- No timers, or points to score
- Play at your own pace

If you like hidden objects games, then you will love this app!
